text: Gremuchy () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Kharabali, Kharabalinsky District, Astrakhan Oblast, Russia. The population was 147 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located on the Akhtuba River, 6 km south- west from Kharabali. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kharabalinsky District
title: Gremuchy
